name: Mighty Lonely Fighting Randy
description:
Pilot the Mighty Bot by yourself since the other lazy Randys didn't show up to work!

For the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019

Theme: Only One 

On the right side of the screen run and jump around the Robot to activate it's different abilities. Hit the arrow block to choose a direction, then both legs to move forward. Activate the purple arm to use the Super Sword and the green arm to use the Reflector Shield

On the left screen to navigate the battle area. Monsters will try to destroy the cities and it's up to you to stop them. They can't kill the Mighty Bot but they can implant explosive mines.

If you lose all of the Cities it's game over!
